constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 113 (Tuesday, June 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McCLINTOCK:
H.R. 4231.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2 (the Property Clause),
which confers on Congress the power to make all needful Rules
and Regulations respecting the property belonging to the
United States
[Page H3308]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

title: Proven Forest Management Act of 2021
